channel.title: Need step by step view of making server
channel.description:

client : Eyrescape system : Hamachi what i type in compile and that and runserver and how do i add admins plz show picture not just text use both for better explanations u never no next time ur on mine u could be admin
what is another source instead of hamachi [br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2006, 07:33:37 PM[/size][hr]i also need the file

item.title: Need step by step view of making server
item.dc:creator: @rob1601 rob1601
item.description:
@rob1601 wrote:

note: stream.java uses or overrides a depreicated API.
note: recompiile with -Xlint : deprication for details
press any key to continue…

That means that the server has been compiled with out any errors. You need to add this to run your server

@echo off
title p00ningscape
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Delete the other stuff and paste that in when you edit startserver.bat or what ever

Read full topic
